Package control

Class AdmSettings

java.lang.Object
control.AdmSettings
public final class AdmSettings extends Object
Settings Management Class, hosts tasks and important things related to it
Since:
1.3

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    AdmSettings.ColorSetType
    Enum Helper to Set the SVG Icon Color Filters
    static enum 
    AdmSettings.DataMode
    Enum Helper to handle input or manual mode client and app data
    static enum 
    AdmSettings.SupportedLanguagesAndLocales
    Enum Helper to manage languages and locales for the application

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    applyLanguageInApp()
    Applies and makes effective the already set language as the the application language to this current Java Virtual Machine as the default locale making every window opens with the corresponding language, also set the corresponding proper ResourceBundle object to make all app windows texts and strings manually coded match with the new language and finally, it calls the proper method in the main window to update its G.U.I. text components to the current language.

      Since:

    • applyThemeManager

      public void applyThemeManager(String currentGuiLafTheme)
      Manages the set of a Look and Feel Theme on the Application with a given Look and Feel String that contains its name, following 3 needed steps.

      The first step is to call the method themeSetter, which is the one in charge to apply the theme sending the Laf name to it as parameter.

      The second step is to call the FlatLaf.updateUI method to update all the current Application UI tree.

      And the third step is to update properly the JFileChooser used to open and save Cinema Tickets files by calling the method in charge, this needs to be donde independently due to the JFIleChooser nature.

      So once these 3 steps are done with no error, only then and not before, it is possible to conclude that the laf theme has been successfuly applied.

      Parameters:
      currentGuiLafTheme - The String representation that contains a Look and Feel name
      Since:
      1.4

    • gettingBackToSavedTheme

      public void gettingBackToSavedTheme(String themeInProperties)
      Returns the application to the theme saved in user settings, this occurs if user applies a certain laf theme different to the actual saved theme in user settings, but decides to click on cancel button instead ok button, so this method reverses that operation
      Parameters:
      themeInProperties - The actual theme saved in user settings Properties object
      Since:
      1.4

    • loadLanguageFromPreferences

      public void loadLanguageFromPreferences(String strSavedLocale)
      Loads the language saved in user settings properties file and sets it as the current application language with that given specified saved locale, this method is mostly used when the application starts to automatically apply the right language, either the one by default or the one specified by the user
      Parameters:
      strSavedLocale - A locale saved in the properties file to set and apply the application language
      Since:
      1.6

    • applyLanguageInApp

      public void applyLanguageInApp()
      Applies and makes effective the already set language as the the application language to this current Java Virtual Machine as the default locale making every window opens with the corresponding language, also set the corresponding proper ResourceBundle object to make all app windows texts and strings manually coded match with the new language and finally, it calls the proper method in the main window to update its G.U.I. text components to the current language.

      This is because when a language is set, it is set to the respective attribute, but it is not made effective, this means the application does not shows the new language yet, but this method makes the language effective and actually applies it to the application

      Since:
      1.6

    • getAPP_VERSION

      public static String getAPP_VERSION()
      Gets a String with the application version using predefined constants
      Returns:
      This Application actual version
      Since:
      1.6

    • getAppLanguage

      public static AdmSettings.SupportedLanguagesAndLocales getAppLanguage()
      Gets this application language
      Returns:
      This application SupportedLanguagesAndLocales enum constant that represents the current language value applied in the application
      Since:
      1.6

    • setAppLanguage

      public static void setAppLanguage(String language)
      Sets the application language in a custom way made to accept a String parameter that caontains the language, it could be the whole word because it does a substring taking only the first 2 letters, this is done this way because it works properly at least with english and spanish that are the 2 unique languages available until this version at least
      Parameters:
      language - The String language representation to set the application language up
      Since:
      1.6

    • getLanguageBundle

      public static ResourceBundle getLanguageBundle()
      Gets the application language bundle
      Returns:
      This Application proper Language ResourceBundle object depending on the current locale and language set
      Since:
      1.6

    • setFileTypeToSave

      public void setFileTypeToSave(String fileType)
      Sets the file type setting property the application has to use to save files, this is made in a custom way accepting a String as file type parameter and converting it to the respective enum constant that is actually the one used as file type attribute in the application
      Parameters:

      Since:
      1.6
      See Also:
